issue.title: [R] Implement dplyr::across() inside mutate()
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11699](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11699). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It's not a generic, but because it seems only to be called inside of functions like `mutate()`, we can insert our own version of it into the NSE data mask
